skrull.rmi.server
Interface IClientUpdater

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SkrullClientUpdater
public interface IClientUpdater
extends java.io.Serializable

Provides a proxy for communicating with the clients. Outgoing game model updates are routed from here to interested clients All the details about contacting and communicating to the view/client are isolated here

Author:
jesse

Method Summary
 void checkPlayerConnected(IPlayer p)
          Verify that the player client is still connected
 void modelChanged(IGameModel model)
          Pass an update to all interested clients
